description: The Biden administration touts the recent decline in border crossings as a policy win. But one family's story of risking the journey shows why asylum restrictions aren't a long-term solution.
title: At the border, migrants ‘wait and see’ as encounters with Border Patrol dip 40%

description: Writing and directing her first film, playwright Annie Baker exhibits uncanny powers of observation. Not much happens in this mother-daughter movie, but something momentous seems to have taken place.
title: Sharply funny 'Janet Planet' perfectly captures the feel of a long, hot summer

description: It’s rare for the third installment of a franchise to resonate just as deeply, if not more, than its predecessors. But Day One manages to raise fresh, existential questions.
title: In prequel 'A Quiet Place: Day One,' Lupita Nyong'o's performance speaks for itself

description: Biden and Trump will hold their first presidential debate tonight. Scientists think understanding how the brain removes waste and toxins may help treat a broad range of disorders.
title: How to watch the Biden-Trump debate. And, your brain's waste removal system

description: A roundup of useful advice from our June episodes: how to reach a "eureka moment" at work, the safest place to put a grill (not against the house!), and a counterintuitive way to get over your crush.
title: Top tips from Life Kit: 7 ideas to make your summer safer and brighter

description: The Iron Dome system has protected Israelis for more than a decade, but it can't stop everything. A war in Lebanon could push it past its limits.
title: Israel's many conflicts could soon crack its Iron Dome

description: Troubled plane maker Boeing is changing how it trains new recruits at the factory near Seattle where it assembles the 737 Max, part of a broader effort to improve quality after a midair blowout.
title: At the factory that builds the 737 Max, Boeing rethinks how it trains new hires

description: Virtuosic pianist and composer Beethoven suffered from several debilitating ailments. A new study suggests lead poisoning may be at least partly to blame.
title: Beethoven was a classical and romantic composer, but his body was full of heavy metal

description: The versatile singer, who emphasizes self-acceptance, says his mission is to be a bridge from the classical community to pop, jazz and R & B. And if you’re not a fan, that’s okay.
title: Countertenor John Holiday isn't trying to make you love him

description: In the beloved FX show’s third season, the focus is on running a fine-dining restaurant. For Carmy and the rest of the staff, questions of creativity and excellence become central.
title: In ‘The Bear’ Season 3, experimentation is still on the menu

description: Amazon's stock has gained 52% in the past 12 months, partly driven by enthusiasm for the company's investments in artificial intelligence.
title: Amazon becomes the 5th U.S. company to reach $2 trillion in stock market value
